sql.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS friendships (id serial PRIMARY KEY, user1_id text NOT NULL, user2_id text NOT NULL, status text DEFAULT 'active', initiated_by text NOT NULL, created_at timestamptz DEFAULT now(), updated_at timestamptz DEFAULT now(), CONSTRAINT chk_different_users CHECK (user1_id <> user2_id), CONSTRAINT unq_friendship UNIQUE (user1_id, user2_id))
